name: Pokemon Showdown - Marowak-Alola
description: Based on Marowak's new Alola form.
additional_info:
27/11/16 - Changed the color of links to a more eye-friendly color.
11/12/16 - Changed the mega evo and z-move buttons to fit the style and not be completely white and little things in the teambuilder.
13/12/16 - Showdown added type icons to the teambuilder which messed with the skin, that's now fixed.
18/12/16 - Changed chat highlight color.
--------------------
Used this style by DunDealStylish as template. https://userstyles.org/styles/107751/dundealstylish-minimalist-80-s
Main background by R-nowong http://www.deviantart.com/art/Pokemon-Alola-Marowak-632712265
Battle background by Dragibuz http://dragibuz.deviantart.com/art/Marowak-s-Ghost-Inferno-627940093
